forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 49. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. East southeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock ticks past midnight in Downtown San Francisco, the city rests under a canopy of clarity; the skies reveal a deep, velvety enormity free from the usual fog, promising a serene start to the day. With temperatures hovering in the cool embrace of 49 degrees, the ambiance feels crisp, invigorating, almost like a gentle nudge from nature. The winds whisper softly, drifting from the north at a leisurely pace of around 7 mph, adding a delicate layer to the night’s tranquility.

Tomorrow unfolds with the promise of sunshine, brightening the cityscape and coaxing a high around 61 degrees by afternoon. Yet, just as the warmth builds, a subtle coolness will descend, wrapping the day in a comforting embrace as temperatures taper to around 58. Ideal for wandering through neighborhoods, this weather invites you to savor the outdoors. A light jacket will serve you well—something cozy but not too bulky. Perhaps a stroll through the Presidio, where the vastness of the ocean meets the rugged cliffs, or a quiet moment at a café along the Embarcadero, watching the city awaken beneath a radiant sun. It’s a day that whispers of simple pleasures; a chance to breathe deep and relish the awakening of a vibrant city without the usual fog creating barriers to your view.
